CLIs

portfolio website

Portfolio website built with jekyll, a static site generator, and hosted on github pages.

Random name generator

A GUI generator application to help gamers with creating original nicknames for their characters.

Study helper

GUI application written in java (javaFx), it is a study tool that includes features like calendar, task scheduling, priority queue and flashcards. I do not take credig for the whole project since it has been built in collaboration with my classmates.

Chatroom commandline application

A simple application that uses sockets and chatrooms for messaging, written in erlang.
